name: Reshama Shaikh
bio: Reshama is a freelance data scientist/statistician with skills in Python, R and SAS. She has a background as a biostatistician in the pharmaceutical industry, where she worked for over 10 years. She also taught math and statistics for 2 years at Temple University. She is an organizer of the meetups group NYC Women in Machine Learning & Data Science and NYC PyLadies. Her interests include:  statistics, deep learning, python, open source, diversity & inclusion, education, technology, leadership and strategic change.
